text: By directing soldiers to public works project, your general can make use of many idle hands.
Direct a trusted aide to take care of your estate's finances, and open the yields of your holdings for your war efforts.
Your retainer will travel the commandery, and take stock of the households and families, to ensure correct records can be maintained.
By having a wizened and well-learned tutor look after the youths, you can help nurture your nation's future.
Birds flying in the sky as one, branches growing in the ground as one.
Jades require polishing to become gems, and parents are responsible for their children's education.
By having your advisor schmooze and woo the local influential clans and elders, the people of the region will come to quickly accept your command.
Have your officer issue a general pardon, and accept local banditry, outlaws, refugees and beggars into your cities, to be put to work.

Your subordinate will encourage those households of a neighboring region to pack up their belongings and migrate commanderies, promising food and work to those willing, and showing a drawn sword to those less willing.
Sent out to the country, your attendant will teach your officers, giving them increased experience.
